reviews.customers_say: Customers find this sweater well-made, soft, and comfortable, noting it's not as itchy or stiff as wool.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cozy, Classic, and Surprisingly High Quality
items.body: This blue V-neck sweater arrived today, and I was pleasantly surprised the moment I opened the package. It feels substantial and well made, with a nice weight to it and quality stitching throughout. Honestly, it feels like an expensive sweater at a fraction of the cost. It’s incredibly versatile — perfect with jeans, black pants, skirts, or layered under a blazer. It keeps you warm without feeling heavy, making it an ideal winter staple. I love how comfortable yet polished it looks, and it comes in so many great color options. For reference, I’m 5’2”, 125 pounds, and ordered a medium. The fit is perfect for me — slightly relaxed with room to move. I could have sized down to a small for a more fitted look, so if you prefer a closer fit and are around my size, I’d recommend sizing down. Overall, I absolutely love this sweater and would highly recommend it. Read more
items.author: Michelle Miller

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft, stylish, comfy and made well.
items.body: This sweater is true to size, soft, not itchy, is machine washable and I have purchased 4 different colors of this v-neck long sleeve sweater from Anrabess. It is medium weight (not too thin and not too thick) and the length is perfect. I am 5'4" & 130# and purchased Small. The red is Christmas red (not orange or pink). I also have the deep blue, nutmeg and almond. They can be worn with jeans or dress pants. Super happy about the comfort of this sweater as I now own 4! I wash them on gentle with persil and dried on low heat with no shrinking. Definitely worth the investment! Read more
items.author: Judywoo

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Oversized look and velvety
items.body: Bought the large and I'm 185 lbs and 5'6. It fits but has a lot of extra material around waist and sleeves and the shoulders don't fall right. I'm already a big lady so not sure if I like the look. Slightly scratchy so will need to wear a light camisole under it. It feels and looks like a cashmere. Very very soft. Has weight to it. Not a flimsy sweater. Looks well made. 4 stars for sizing being incorrect on size guide. Read more
items.author: Homeschool Mom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful Sweater!
items.body: This is the nicest, softest and well made sweater! The fit is perfect~ I am 5"2" and 120 and ordered a small. The colors are beautiful! I ordered Royal Blue, Light Grey and Deep Blue~ If you're hesitating, order just one and give it a try! Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater for a great price
items.body: Nice weight, good feeling material. Fit nicely. Bought 2 different colors that were nice. I like my sweaters a bit large. Size was great. Read more
items.author: Pamela Royer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Very itchy
items.body: Stylish yet smallish, heavy weight sweater. The short of this review is: I returned it 90% because it was SO itchy & 10% because it was on the small side. I coukd have delta with small because at 5'2", 125lbs, 24" waist, 34C bust, I'm also small but the size small just fit. Not sure how it would have fared once washed but the instant itch was really off putting. I had to shower to stop the itch. Im not sure if it was that sweater as an isolated incident but the overwhelming reviews note the sweater as soft. I didn't feel soft at all. It was scratchy acrylic. The sweater was very thick which if it would have been soft, would have been a huge selling point to me but the size was on the small side and frankly, I'm getting a but annoyed by the lack of size standardization. I have many tips from Amazon and as per my previous measurements which have stayed the same for at least 10 years, I have various sizes of clothing ranging from xs up to large. At this point, it makes sense to buy what I think plus one up or down but I never know which way to go. The navy color I bought is beautiful and looks in person as it appeared on my screen. The pattern was also the same. The fit was too small and the itch was unbearable so it went back. Disappointed to say the least. Read more
items.author: Amber

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality sweater!
items.body: I return about 40% of my Amazon clothing purchases. Probably should be 60%, but I digress. This sweater is an absolute keeper. The fabric is beautiful and much thicker than I expected. I purchased it in brown and the color is as advertised. Size is accurate. This is not a light summer sweater. It has structure and medium bulk. The quality is excellent and looks high-end. I’m very happy with it. Read more
items.author: Pam B

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice quality. Soft. Cozy
items.body: Soft and warm. I wear a size 10 dress. The medium fits comfortably. I have never been disappointed with Anrabess. Read more
items.author: K NJ

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve V Neck is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Nutmeg, Army Green, Hot Pink, Black, Coffee, Navy Blue, Dark Red, Light Blue, Red, Almond, White, Deep Blue, Royal Blue, Dark Forest Green. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs.
